full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SA LAM GYI RNAM GZHAG THEG GSUM MDZES RGYAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,(CES SA LAM GYI RNAM BZHAG THEG GSUM MDZES RGYAN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, AA LAG SH'A NAS BYAN PHYOGS SKYE DGU'I 'DREN MCHOG DAM PAR GYUR BA KUN SGROL NO MON HAN RIN PO CHES, ,BKRA SHIS PA'I LHA RDZAS, ,DNGUL GYI MAndAL DANG BCAS BSKUL NGOR, ,BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS SBYAR BA'O, ,@018B 'JAM MGON NGAG LA DBANG BA'I BLO'I RTZAL GYIS, ,TSIG DON DBYANGS SU SDEBS MKHAS PON BZANG, ,RNAM BKRA'I LAM GSUM 'DAB BRGYA BZHAD PA'I RTZIS, ,BSKAL BZANG RIG PA 'GRUB CHED SPAR BTABS STE, ,LTA SPYOD SGRIN GYIS MA SGRIBS BSTAN PA'I MKHA', ,BSTAN 'DZIN NYI ZLA'I GZI YIS GSAL BA DANG, ,RIGS GSUM PHAN BDE'I LO TOG CHER RGYAS TE, ,THEG GSUM SA LAM 'BRAS BU MYUR SMIN SHOG ,RGYU SBYOR GTZO BYAS LUS CAN CHO DABS KUN, ,DAL 'BYOR PHRENG RDOG BSTAN PA'I SRAR BUR LTAR, ,THEG MCHOG BSHES GNYEN ROG GIS NYER MDZES LAS, ,'JIG RTEN KUN GYI RGYAN DU GYUR BAR SHOG ,(CES SA LAM RNAM BZHAG GI SPAR BYANG 'DI RGYU SBYOR BA NGA LAS THU SHE GUNG GI SHOG DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYI 'DOD MOS LTAR BRIS, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,))
